title: Listener Stories: Vol. 28
description:
May we just say, "happy May"?! This month we're reading your stories that include a beach cult, a haunted library, and a pelvis found on a hiking trail. We're also terrified by a very near miss from a Megan... and that's why we drink!
Please consider supporting the companies that support us!
Get 20% off your order of dress pant yoga pants when you go to betabrand.com/drink
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Kast Media)
